name: The Dumb Secret
description:
This is a game from my first game jam I hope you like it, its dumb and short but I hope you give it a try!!! You have to figure out the secret..........there is 3 endings

- Controls

               -arrow keys to move 

-Please give me feed back and any bugs you find in the game!!!

- Try my other games,https://shadownat3.itch.io/what-is-my-purpose, https://shadownat3.itch.io/the-dumb-secret,https://shadownat3.itch.io/one-leaf-after-another
